sentences.sContent: The state in certain fungi in which each compartment of a hypha contains two nuclei, each derived from a different parent.
sentences.sContent_eng: The state in certain fungi in which each compartment of a hypha contains two nuclei, each derived from a different parent.
sentences.sCn: 双核某种真菌中的状态，在这种真菌中，每个菌丝体都含有两个核，而每个核都是从不同的母体上衍生的。

sentences.sContent: Dextrose and maltose was the best carbon source, while asparagine (Asn)was the optimum nitrogen source for both hypha growth and spore bearing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dextrose and maltose was the best carbon source, while asparagine (Asn)was the optimum nitrogen source for both hypha growth and spore bearing.
sentences.sCn: 葡萄糖和麦芽糖为菌丝生长和产孢的最佳碳源。 天冬酰胺是菌丝生长和孢子产生的最佳氮源。

sentences.sContent: Effect of dews on cucumber leaves and juice of cucumber leaves of different varieties on the ratio of germination, quantity of sprout and length of hypha was different.
sentences.sContent_eng: Effect of dews on cucumber leaves and juice of cucumber leaves of different varieties on the ratio of germination, quantity of sprout and length of hypha was different.
sentences.sCn: 不同黄瓜品种叶表露珠及叶片研磨液对分生孢子萌发率、 芽管数量、菌丝长短有显著影响。

trans.tranOther: any of the filaments that constitute the body (mycelium) of a fungus
